commands.name: about
commands.description: Displays information about Jeff and this terminal.
commands.details: Jeff is a seasoned developer and finance expert with years of experience in technology, finance, and the crypto space. He has worked on numerous innovative projects that blend tech and finance, making an impact in both industries. This terminal is designed to showcase Jeff's portfolio, skills, and insights.

commands.name: social
commands.description: Displays links to Jeff's social profiles.

commands.name: projects
commands.description: Shows a list of Jeff's projects.
commands.details: Jeff's projects include financial modeling tools, blockchain applications, and AI-driven investment platforms.

commands.name: tech-stack
commands.description: Lists the technologies Jeff specializes in.
commands.details: Jeff specializes in Python, JavaScript, Solidity, blockchain technologies, and financial modeling tools.

commands.name: experience
commands.description: Displays a summary of Jeff's professional experience.
commands.details: Jeff has over 10 years of experience in technology, finance, and cryptocurrency. He has held roles as a developer, financial analyst, and blockchain advisor.

commands.name: blog
commands.description: Links to Jeff's blog or articles.

commands.name: news
commands.description: Shows the latest updates or announcements from Jeff.
